ItemTooltips.boots: Grab at the side shop after your RoB.
ItemTooltips.cloak: Side shop. Get this before or after the RoH depending on whether or not you're seeing a lot of magic damage coming your way.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: You tend to a live a long time, so you get a lot of charges.
ItemTooltips.dust: For revealing invis heroes, if you prefer dust to sentries.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer:
You'll likely being going hard lane, so pick up wards. at the start. One for the rune, one for their pull camp.

Then keep buying wards throughout the game.

Even late game. Especially late game.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: As a melee, you can't deward alone. But if there is an invis hero or a Shadow Blade on the enemy team, get this and drop it before likely team fights to prevent the invis heroes from initiating.
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Side shop. Be ready to teleport to help out allies. A teleport and tombstone will turn a dive into a slaughter.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: If no one else got this, get it.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Have a melee carry who already has an orb effect? Be a champion and pick up this item.
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: If no one else has gotten this, get this. You should have a flying courier before 6 minutes ideally, and for certain before 10 minutes.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: You can finish RoB at the side shop.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Use before or during every team fight.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: If no one else has gotten one.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: An alternative way of dealing with invis heroes. Also good for pushing. Does require a bit of micro.
ItemTooltips.assault: A great aura to get if you're somehow swimming in cash.
ItemTooltips.heart: To making Undying even more Undying. If you're getting this as a support Undying, you've likely already won.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Probably your go-to late game item. Another powerful aura.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: If you need to be a bit tankier, this is a solid pick up.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: You may choose to finish this before all the items in Early Game. Adapt to your game.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Undying tends to stay alive, so he does a great job as an aura-based support.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Smoke ganks, smoke Rosh -- smoke is an amazing item you should be sure to pick up.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: If you have an enemy right-click carry that needs to be shut down, there's no better item that you can get.

AbilityTooltips.undying_decay: Be sparing with this until you get your arcane boots. You want the mana for tombstone first.
AbilityTooltips.undying_soul_rip:
As a support Undying, you're likely not going to be living forever (as your farm is going to low) so getting stats instead of this so-so ability is the right call.

Get a point in this if there is a Rubick on the enemy team, so you can cast this after Tombstone to make him cry.
AbilityTooltips.undying_tombstone:
Your best ability. Use to acquire first blood with your lane partner. Use in team fights.

If there is a Rubick, DO NOT LET HIM STEAL THIS. Cast Soul Rip (just get a point) immediately after you cast this.
AbilityTooltips.undying_flesh_golem: This is how Undying stays Undying. Use in team fights.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: As a support Undying, stats are a good investment because they give you what you need most: health and mana.
